tasks.title: Project Setup and Base HTML Structure
tasks.description: Create foundational HTML files and include required CDN dependencies
tasks.details:
1. Create index.html, cards_indiv.html, and projects_indiv.js
2. Include Tailwind CSS CDN
3. Add Google Fonts for Playfair Display, Plus Jakarta Sans, JetBrains Mono
4. Set up basic DOM structure with semantic HTML
5. Add CNAME file for custom domain

Pseudo-code:
<!-- index.html -->
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.x.x/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display..." rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body class="bg-[#FAFAF9] font-sans">
  <!-- Content will be injected via JS -->
  <script src="projects_indiv.js"></script>
  <script src="main.js"></script>
</body>
</html>
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify all CDN resources load without errors
2. Check console for 404 errors
3. Validate HTML structure using W3C validator
4. Confirm CNAME file contains mknguyen.space
